addWord.oops: Oops, we don't find match word
addWord.improve: Improve pebidi with this new word
explicationExtension: This extension permit to translate a word in one click on evry page you visit. You can also add this word in your pebidi with only one click more!
createYoursFull: Create your Pebidi and save your own list of word
homepage.explication2: Pebidi permits you to don't forget all essential word
testYourKnowledgeOn: Test your knowledge on the word's list
homepage.explication1: You just have to enter your email, then you can save words you just have learn.
improve.newWord: Improve Pebidi by adding a new word
notExistYet: We don't find this word. If it exist we will find the translation and automaticaly add it to your pebidi.
showBeta.lang: Sorry but in beta version the only possibility is english to french dictionary. Tweet us to have new language!
remarkCreateGroup: Warning, creating a group imply a new empty dictionary. If you want to keep your current words you have to add this group to your new dictionary.
submitCreateGroup: Transform your pebidi to a group
atLeast15Words: You need to have a least 10 words to create a group
addGroupWordExplication: To save time you can add group of words (or a part of it), and you can also create yours with your actual pebidi!
bigAddNotRecommend: Pebidi does not recommend to add big group of word, because it will be very dificult to have a relevant scrore.
